user.about: With a recent BFA in Graphic Design, I'm playing with css to make sites I frequent more palatable.

additional_info:
v2.0.0
The site is in the middle of a redesign and it looks great!
Sadly, it made most of the old code obsolete. So I'm starting over from scratch.

v2.0.2
Lots of minor changes

v2.1.0
Here's a month's worth of changes I've been mildly hesitant to include.
I adjusted padding on the whole page, so there's more room for the body copy and less wasted space.
The dark background is now 100% black.
I've started to fix tables, the ones in classes look good but most others are still a mess.
